Create a new sonification map object

Parameters:
defaultNotes - a backup of the notes before any modifications that may occurs
defaultInstrument - the instrument used before any modifications that may occurs
propertyName - the property that activate this sonification map
soundPropertyName - the sound property that is affected by the somification map
mapType - the type of transformation that may occurs
a0 - the value of a0
a1 - the value of a1
a2 - the value of a2
a3 - the value of a3

cloneArray

protected int[][] cloneArray(int[][] sourceArray)
Utility function user to clone a 2 dimension array. This is required while the multidimensional arrays can't be cloned using clone().

Parameters:
sourceArray - the array that needs to be cloned
Returns:
a clone of the given source array
